title: Drawing, "Henry IV Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper
markings: Marks in graphite, upper right, lower left and right
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: The king wears a costume in browns and blues. He wears a gold crown, a robe decorated with stars and holds an orb topped with a cross in his right hand. He has a red beard.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Henry IV Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925.
1925. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-171.
